main event: On 8 July 1954, several observers reported sighting 6-7 unidentified flying objects over Denver, Colorado.
interesting points: The objects were round and silver colored, appearing to be at an altitude of 35,000 to 50,000 feet., The sighting lasted approximately 18-20 minutes with a slight descent at high speed., The objects were described not to be conventional aircraft or balloons and were classified as astronomical., The objects disappeared behind scattered clouds after being visible for over 11 seconds., There was no sound from the objects during the sighting.
witness description: Civilian air traffic controllers and a military officer at Lowry AFB
